pages.title: Onyx Armour
pages.text: To Make Infused Onyx Armour you will need one Infused Onyx per item you wish to make, a Diamond Piece of Armour matching that item and a Gem Upgrade Template.$(br)The Gem Upgrade Template goes in the First Slot, The Diamond Armour goes in the Second Slot and the Infused Onyx goes in the Third Slot

pages.title: Onyx Smithing
pages.text: Equip a Full set of Infused Onyx Armour to Gain a Permenant Strength Boost
